problem:
Is $f(x) = 7x^7 - 4x^4 + 1$ an even function, odd function, or neither?

Enter "odd", "even", or "neither".
solution: Note that $f(1) = 7 - 4 + 1 = 4$ and $f(-1) = 7(-1)^7 - 4(-1)^4 + 1 = -10.$  Since $f(-1)$ is not equal to $f(1)$ or $-f(1),$ $f(x)$ is $\boxed{\text{neither}}$ even nor odd.
